name: raoctober day 4 - "favorite tree wearing favorite pasta"
name_original: raoctober day 4 - "favorite tree wearing favorite pasta"
description:
I, Zinfandel,  have created  this very, very short experience as an  entry for day 4 of raoctober, following the day's theme, "favorite tree wearing favorite pasta". I hope you enjoy  it.

The up and down arrow keys navigate dialog boxes.  Enter or Escape close dialog boxes. Enter also  selects a choice in dialog boxes if you have the cursor lined up with one.

Once you've decided between keyboard/mouse and color/monochrome, close the Reconstruction of ZZT information box and press P at the game's title screen to play. Use the arrow keys to move your player around and walk into things to interact with them.
